thread.title: Excellent location for a good price
thread.title_full: Excellent location for a good price - Review of Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: RicardoCub
title: Excellent location for a good price
text:
Right at the corner of Broadway and 54th street, this modern hotel offers a lot for its price.
The rooms are small, but comfortable, the bathrooms is spot clean, the bed is comfortable and we even got lucky to get an early check in and a late check out for no extra charge.. There is a lounge at the fourth floor with coffee, beer and food with spectacular views of the area.The Ed Sullivan Theatre is around the corner and most of the subway lines are only a block and a half away. I would certainly return!
